mapper.insert: insert into tb_containerinfo( container_id, container_type, in_time, out_time, container_state, create_time, modify_time )values( #{containerId}, #{containerType}, #{inTime}, #{outTime}, null, #{createTime}, null )
mapper.update: update tb_containerinfo set out_time=now() where container_id=#{containerId}
mapper.select: select yard_id from tb_yardmanaging where yard_id like CONCAT(#{yardId},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into tb_deliveryorder( delivery_order_id, ship_id, bill_number, goods_name, weight, size, loading_port, destination_port, consignee_name, address, phone )values( #{deliveryOrderId}, #{shipId}, #{billNumber}, #{goodsName}, #{weight}, #{size}, #{loadingPort}, #{destinationPort}, #{consigneeName}, #{address}, #{phone} )

insert into tb_yardmanaging( yard_id, container_id, storing_time, in_time, out_time, state, create_time, flag )values( #{yardId}, #{containerId}, #{storingTime}, #{inTime}, #{outTime}, #{state}, null,null )
